ability.subtitle: Photo Editor with a Comprehensive Toolkit
ability.desc: Pixelfox is your all-in-one free AI photo retoucher and HD online photo editor, designed for seamless photo retouching and creative edits. Whether you want to retouch photos, remove backgrounds, upscale images, or generate stunning AI art, our AI editing photos toolkit has you covered. With no downloads required, you can edit photos online free anytime, anywhere. From quick photo retouch fixes to advanced ai edit photo transformations, Pixelfox makes it easy. Start using our photo retoucher today and take your creativity to the next level with the best free AI photo editor experience!

remove.title: How to Edit an Image with PixelFox AI Text Prompts?
remove.desc: PixelFox AI Photo editor turns editing your images as simple as telling it what you want. There are only three steps to complete to update any picture with your words:

list.title: Upload Your Image
list.desc: Click “Upload” or drag and drop your image. PixelFox AI Photo editor with text prompts supports JPG, PNG, GIF, or WEBP of up to 20MB or 4096x 4096 dimension.

list.title: Type Your Prompt
list.desc: Write in your own words in your own style. Examples: Any of: make me look like a cartoon, remove the background, add a cyberpunk city as a background.

list.title: Generate & Download
list.desc: Have PixelFox AI Photo Modifier analyzed your photo within seconds. Check out the preview, save your quality result, and share or recycle it immediately.

list.title: Edit with Natural Language Prompts
list.desc: No complicated toolsets, menus or layers to learn though, with PixelFox you can edit an image by telling what to do instead. Feel like to turn the sky into a galaxy? Or make it snowy background? It is just like typing it out, and the AI will take it further.This drag and drop interface reduces the threshold in performing ultimate editing; it is desirable by the users who are not design experts. You can use PixelFox to produce not only social media content, but also digital art, and hastily made product mockups, and PixelFox will convert all your directions into exactly the right edits that are visually harmonious with each other.

list.title: Smart Image Context Awareness
list.desc: PixelFox doesn’t simply change pixels, but knows about the image. Our AI thoroughly examines the lighting, the shadows, the facial structure, the background details, placement of objects on each image to ensure that all the edits blend into the original.To illustrate it, when you pose to say, you would like to change the background to be a sunset, the system will automatically alter the lighting and the shadows in the subject to being warm as sunsets appear. That way even radical changes look natural, photorealistic, and situationally appropriate. The result? Pictures that not only appear to be edited, but which appear that they were photographed in that way.

list.title: Advanced Model Fusion for Superior Results
list.desc: PixelFox has a rare mix of accuracy and creativity because InstructPix2Pix, the model used for textual editing, and Stable Diffusion Img2Img, the model meant to fix the image, have the strengths and weaknesses of both models and are optimally combined through PixelFox.It has this bimodal architecture that makes your corrections more accurate as compared to your prompt and it is also of high visual accuracy. Its performance is out of this world when working with various types of images: selfies, portraits, landscape photos, fashion and product images, and even digital arts. Regardless of how strong your request is, expect sharp edges, even tones, and a small amount of artifacts.

list.title: Multi-Image Composition Support
list.desc: Want to design layered marketing visuals, concept art, or banners in social media? PixelFox enables you to mix or combine several images with ease. Just post pictures of what you desire to be merged and explain what you see- e.g. paste picture of this man against a beach background or make a merge between these two merchandises on a wooden table.Our AI takes into account perspective, size, lighting, smoothness to edges to form a natural composition that appears to be consistent and professionally designed. This comes in particularly handy in e-commerce, advertisements and visual narrative media where consistency of the visual is imperative.

list.title: Lightning-Fast Processing
list.desc: AI edits finish in just 10–30 seconds, allowing you to rapidly explore multiple creative directions.

list.title: No Design Experience Needed
list.desc: Beginners and pros alike can achieve studio-quality results with zero learning curve.

list.title: Custom Control Options
list.desc: Adjust strength, transformation intensity, aspect ratio, and more for tailored results.

list.title: Secure & Private Editing
list.desc: Uploaded images are auto-deleted within hours—your content is never used or shared without consent.

toolset.subtitle: Photo Editor With Full Toolset
toolset.desc: All useful editing tools are ready in one single photo editor online HD - Pixelfox AI. See what our pic editor online can do and try them for FREE!

list.title: Expand Image
list.desc: Effortlessly uncrop and expand images within senconds to create stunning images

list.title: Photo Colorizer
list.desc: Colorize old Photos and Black & White Images Easily online

list.title: Style Transfer
list.desc: Turn images into artworks with famous painter styles and effects

list.title: Image Colour Changer
list.desc: Change image colors and explore endless possibilities

list.title: What can I do with PixelFox AI Image Editor?
list.content: Remove or edit backgrounds, edit styles, insert or delete objects, combine images, cartoonify faces, improve the quality and much more; just type what you desire.

list.title: How realistic are the AI-generated edits?
list.content: Very realistic. PixelFox AI evaluates the shadows, lightings, and depth to implement results quality that meets the original context of the photo.

list.title: Can I use the AI-edited images commercially?
list.content: Yes. Every outcome of a paid plan has a complete commercial usage license in the form of marketing, print, eCommerce, or virtually any business guarantee.

list.title: Can I use Pixelfox AI Text to Image Converter for commercial projects?
list.content: Absolutely! AI generated images can be used in personal & commercial projects like marketing campaigns, educational resources, creative designs, and more.

list.title: What file formats and sizes are supported?
list.content: JPEG, PNG, GIF and WEBP support is complete up to 20MB and 4096x4096 resolution.

list.title: What if the edit doesn’t match my expectation?
list.content: Clean up writing something a bit more clearly or ways to divide the complicated revisions into a small sequence. PixelFox also allows you the chance to repower up alternatives until you get what you desire.

share.eveyone_sign_in_send_points: Daily Check-in: Earn Points Every Day!
share.register_get_free_score: Sign up now and receive free credits
share.can_get_rewards_q: Can I accumulate rewards by sharing on social media?
share.can_get_rewards_a: Absolutely! For each verified social media post, you can earn 10 credits. By sharing the link on your favorite social media platforms, you can earn up to 10 credits in total.
share.can_get_rewards_q1: How many credits can I get for writing a Pixelfox.AI review?
share.can_get_rewards_a1: By posting fact-based, product-focused Pixelfox.AI reviews on G2 and Chrome Web Store, you can earn 10 credits per verified review. Only 1 review post per platform will be accepted.
share.can_get_rewards_q2: How do I claim rewards after posting links or reviews on social media?
share.can_get_rewards_a2: Navigate to the "Rewards" tab in Account Settings and look for the "Upload Screenshot" button. Provide proof of your social media post or product review for our support team to verify and apply the credits to your account.
share.can_get_rewards_q3: How does Pixelfox.AI's "Invite Friends" feature work?
share.can_get_rewards_a3: When you invite friends who successfully register a Pixelfox.AI account, both you and your friend will receive free credits. If the invitee subscribes to one of our paid plans and completes payment, you both will receive additional credit rewards.
share.can_get_rewards_q4: How can I track my invitation progress?
share.can_get_rewards_a4: You can monitor your invitation progress anytime in the "Rewards" tab under Account Settings. Track the number of registrations, successful subscriptions through your referral link, and total credits earned from the program.
